text: My Mom Just Said She Wasn t Proud of Me I ve just spent the past week and weekend working so hard on my studies  I spent the first quarter of the school year in hospital and still maintained a   GPA I speak   languages in America of all places to do so  I was president of school band for   years before my medical situation forced me to drop it I came downstairs today and all she had to ask was  Are you caught up on schoolwork I answered  thinking that my hard work through all of this would make her smile and maybe give an encouraging word Yeah  I have a   in Chem  and As in my other classes She didn t even respond I had to ask what she thought asked if she was proud She didn t even look up and said no

text: Music is my escapeHi guys  i dont know if im allowed to post this but if i am i thought id share some songs with you  These songs have helped me and my friends through a lot  Music for me is an escape  it can bring me into others lives or take me away from everyones  it can cheer me up or be the sad song i need on the sad day  I wanna share two songs with you guys  theyre both from a band called twenty one pilots  there music may seem weird but their lyrics are what got me  ill give a lil example of the lyrics from each song http youtube com watch v ktBMxkLUIwY this song is called holding on to you and its lyrics show hope in sadness  heres some lines from it Remember the moment you know exactly where you re going Cause the next moment  before you know it Time is slowing and it s frozen still And the window sill looks really nice  right You think twice about your life  it probably happens at night Right  Fight it  take the pain  ignite it Tie a noose around your mind loose enough to breathe fine and tie it To a tree  tell it   You belong to me This ain t a noose  this is a leash And I have news for you  you must obey me the next song is kinda sad but it made me break down the first time i heard it  its a slow piano song so if you didnt like the rap of the last song you still might enjoy this http m youtube com watch v eCeBNwBUkcI heres a lil of the lyrics   Now the night is coming to an end The sun will rise and we will try again Stay alive  stay alive for me You will die  but now your life is free Take pride in what is sure to die so i hoped someone found this nice and tell me what songs help you  id love to hear  cya later guys
summary: Music is an escape for cya. He shares two songs from a band called Twenty One Pilots to cheer him up and to cheer up his friends. He wants someone to tell him what songs help him and he would love to hear cya later.
cleaned: music escape share song band call pilot cheer cheer friend want tell song help love hear later
